common_errors.pattern: cross-env.*not found|command not found: cross-env|'cross-env' is not recognized
solutions: Install: npm install --save-dev cross-env
Use in package.json scripts (npm runs local bins)
Or install globally: npm install -g cross-env
Use npx cross-env for one-off usage

common_errors.pattern: env var undefined|variable not passed|process\.env\..* undefined
causes: Spaces in variable value not quoted
solutions: Syntax: cross-env VAR=value command
Quote values with spaces: cross-env VAR="hello world"
Multiple vars: cross-env VAR1=a VAR2=b command
Don't use export: cross-env handles it
Use forward slashes in npm scripts
Quote commands with spaces
Use cross-env-shell for shell-specific syntax
Use npm-run-all for complex scripts

common_errors.pattern: variable not expanded|\$VAR not replaced|shell expansion not working
solutions: Use cross-env-shell for shell expansion
cross-env-shell "echo $VAR"
Or set var and use in same shell command
Windows: use %VAR%, Unix: use $VAR with cross-env-shell
Escape quotes: \"value\"
Avoid complex scripts in package.json
Move complex scripts to shell files
Use node scripts for cross-platform complex logic

common_errors.pattern: second command.*env not set|&& not working|chained command fails
causes: cross-env only sets for immediate child process
solutions: Use cross-env-shell "cmd1 && cmd2"
Or run cross-env for each command in chain
Use npm-run-all to chain scripts
Set env in shell script instead
